quote: It's almost dawn. You can feel it coming. The world holds its breath, because there's really no guarantee that the sun will rise. That there was a yesterday doesn't mean there will be a tomorrow.
quote_letters: ITS ALMOST DAWN YOU CAN FEEL IT COMING THE WORLD HOLDS ITS BREATH BECAUSE THERES REALLY NO GUARANTEE THAT THE SUN WILL RISE THAT THERE WAS A YESTERDAY DOESNT MEAN THERE WILL BE A TOMORROW
